review: The Fire Stick might be the coolest thing I have ever owned. It is easier to use than any smart TV I have ever used, and it has unlimited capabilities.

review: Lagging and stuttering here and there, but from my experiences with Roku and AppleTV, this product performs amazing. Especially so given its price point.

review: We have no use for an X-box or anything like that...but wanted to have Netflix.  This little FireStick did the trick.We love it!

review: I got the Fire Stick instead of buying a antenna for an extra tv. I must say my children do enjoy this device and so do I. I am able to limit television watching by simply taking out the stick. I think it is a great device.

review: Simple to install.  Easy to use and with Amazon Prime plus the many other Apps it is an entertainment goldmine.
